entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches near the bay. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches near the bay early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
